section.heading: Disposition of property — Basis for determination of gain or loss.
section.text: The basis for determining the gain or loss from the sale or other disposition of property shall be the same basis as that provided for determining gain or loss under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

annotations.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 350, ch. 258, art. I, title XI, § 1
